title: Knitting School booklet
body_html:
Książka jest w języku angielskim.

You have a very special booklet in your hands: KNITTING SCHOOL by Sys Fredens.

The booklet was originally published by Klematis in 2004 and has been discontinued after selling more than 35.000 copies.

In cooperation with knitting designer Sys Fredens, Hobbii now has a unique opportunity to publish this iconic booklet that will help any beginner enter the knitting universe safely and stylishly.

The booklet contains all the original patterns, now updated with yarns sold by Hobbii. The patterns in the booklet are timeless and still ideal for beginners who want to learn how to knit from scratch, or intermediates who want to try their hands at knitting a sweater. The booklet fits perfectly in your bag, but you also have the option of learning the techniques on Hobbii’s own YouTube channel.

Sys Fredens writes: It’s amazing that this book can still inspire knitters, whether they’re beginners or intermediates. The book opens with an introduction to knitting to ensure that any reader will get off to a good start. The first patterns are simple, while the last patterns increase in difficulty.

All designs are knit in neutral shades, but you can find all the yarns listed on Hobbii’s website in many wonderful colors to suit your specific tastes.

The following items can be knit with this booklet:

  • Knit stitch (garter stitch) hat (100 g (3.5 oz) of Woolpower)

  • Knit stitch (garter stitch) scarf (200 g (7 oz) of Woolpower)

  • Knit stitch (garter stitch) vest (500 g (17.6 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Rib stitch scarf (200 g (7 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Wrist warmers (100 g (3.5 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Stocking stitch hat with pompom (100 g (3.5 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Leg and wrist warmers with crocheted edges (100 g Snowstorm for the leg warmers, 100 g Snowstorm for the wrist warmers (3.5 oz each))

  • Moss stitch shawl (300 g (10.6 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Fisherman’s rib tube (200 g (7 oz) of Snowstorm)

  • Sweater with cables and turtleneck (700 g (24.7 oz) of Snowstorm)

Number of pages: 32 Author: Sys Fredens Published: 2020

title: Knitting Tips
body_html:
Książka jest w języku angielskim.

You have your yarn, knitting needles and a pattern ... and then what?

Learn old and new knitting techniques:

  • different cast-ons and bind-offs

  • reading a chart

  • invisible joining

  • magic loop method and loads more

In other words: knitting tips about all the stuff that is not explained in the patterns – for beginners as well as advanced knitters.

Autor: Sys Fredens Zdjęcia: Claus Dalby Liczba stron: 48 stron Rok wydania: 2022 Wymiar: 18 x 18 cm
